rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
乳腺癌侵袭的新物理机制被发现大多数乳腺癌始于乳腺导管内壁，如果它们保留在那里，则非常容易治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-physical-mechanism-uncovered-for-breast-cancer-invasion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-physical-mechanism-uncovered-for-breast-cancer-invasion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fda91ad-5574-4e03-bf92-b7b4e29fd85c Mon, 13 Nov 2023 21:22:09 -0500 New physical mechanism uncovered for breast cancer invasion
多方位实施策略显着降低低收入患者血压不受控制的高血压是全世界心血管疾病和过早死亡的主要可预防危险因素，对低收入人群的影响尤为严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Multi-faceted-implementation-strategy-significantly-lowers-blood-Pressure-in-low-venue-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Multi-faceted-implementation-strategy-significantly-lowers-blood-Pressure-in-low-venue-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d41008d-71d2-42f7-a128-5a7320b559af Mon, 13 Nov 2023 21:16:19 -0500 Multi-faceted implementation strategy significantly lowers blood pressure in low-income patients
大鼠研究表明血液透析加生酮饮食可以增强癌症治疗《科学报告》中的这项研究调查了血液透析 (HD) 在生酮饮食大鼠中维持升高的血酮水平的潜力，并探索其作为癌症治疗辅助手段的用途。结果表明，HD 可以维持酮水平，同时降低葡萄糖和胰岛素，这表明可能会增强癌症治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Rat-study-suggests-hemodialysis-plus-ketogenic-diet-could-enhance-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Rat-study-suggests-hemodialysis-plus-ketogenic-diet-could-enhance-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71a48275-d678-4ad6-bb00-1a26e3ac751e Mon, 13 Nov 2023 21:12:00 -0500 Rat study suggests hemodialysis plus ketogenic diet could enhance cancer treatment
新的检测方法可以改善急性髓系白血病的检测和治疗根据爱思唯尔在《分子诊断杂志》上发表的一篇新报告，一种检测急性髓系白血病 (AML) 患者独特分子标记的新方法可能会彻底改变这种疾病的检测和治疗方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Novel-assay-may-improve-detection-and-treatment-of-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Novel-assay-may-improve-detection-and-treatment-of-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f7eb87a-488a-4790-a9a5-b19b10293dbf Mon, 13 Nov 2023 21:03:07 -0500 Novel assay may improve detection and treatment of acute myeloid leukemia
研究表明同时接种 COVID-19 和流感疫苗有效，尤其是对老年人JAMA Network Open 中的研究评估了同时接种 Pfizer-BioNTech BNT162b2 BA.4/5 COVID-19 疫苗和季节性流感疫苗与单独接种的有效性。结果表明，联合用药后，COVID-19 的结果相似或略有增加，流感相关的结果较低，特别是在 65 岁及以上的人群中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-reveals-coadministered-COVID-19-and-flu-vaccines- effective-special-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-reveals-coadministered-COVID-19-and-flu-vaccines- effective-special-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74f4cc98-610a-4b9e-8fac-c714cf20ecb0 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 20:59:00 -0500 Study reveals coadministered COVID-19 and flu vaccines effective, especially in seniors
自动转诊至药房服务极大地提高了他汀类药物的适当处方率开出适当剂量的他汀类药物（一种用于降低“坏”胆固醇水平的药物）的可能性；宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的研究人员表示，当自动转诊到药房服务而不是依赖传统的处方方法时，这一数字增加了六倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Automated-referrals-to-pharmacy-services-dramatically-increase-property-statin-prescription-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Automated-referrals-to-pharmacy-services-dramatically-increase-property-statin-prescription-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21f748f2-6ed6-4488-8c71-9a34c3afbc1f Mon, 13 Nov 2023 20:57:58 -0500 Automated referrals to pharmacy services dramatically increase appropriate statin prescription rates
瑞典研究显示，疫苗接种后 Omicron 时代医院获得性 COVID-19 死亡率下降在《JAMA Network Open》上发表的一项研究中，研究人员发现斯德哥尔摩的医院获得性 SARS-CoV-2 感染导致疫苗接种前 30 天的死亡率增加，但在疫苗接种后的 Omicron 波期间死亡率显着降低。该研究强调了疫苗接种对于降低院内 SARS-CoV-2 感染死亡风险的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Hospital-acquired-COVID-19-mortality-drops-in-Omicron-era-post-vaccination-reveals-Swedish-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Hospital-acquired-COVID-19-mortality-drops-in-Omicron-era-post-vaccination-reveals-Swedish-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=567a5d9d-0415-4248-bcd7-c55d13d44736 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 17:26:00 -0500 Hospital-acquired COVID-19 mortality drops in Omicron era post-vaccination, reveals Swedish study
研究显示长期患有神经精神症状的新冠患者没有神经炎症在一项 JAMA Network Open 研究中，研究人员发现，与对照组相比，患有 COVID-19 后病情和神经精神症状的个体的脑脊液标记物中没有发现神经炎症或血脑屏障功能障碍的证据。这项研究评估了细胞因子、趋化因子和神经炎症标志物，表明持续的中枢神经系统免疫激活可能不是神经性长期新冠症状的主要驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-reveals-no-neuroinflammation-in-long-COVID-患者-with-neuropsychiatric-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-reveals-no-neuroinflammation-in-long-COVID-患者-with-neuropsychiatric-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08a037ca-bac6-4b15-adec-64f2becbd2fd Mon, 13 Nov 2023 16:29:00 -0500 Study reveals no neuroinflammation in long COVID patients with neuropsychiatric symptoms
运动后最佳补水：研究比较运动饮料中钠和碳水化合物的含量以实现有效补液在这项研究中，研究人员比较了不同碳水化合物和钠含量的运动饮料对运动员运动后补液的效果，发现钠含量较高和碳水化合物含量较低的饮料对于快速、完全补液更有效。该研究强调了饮料成分在运动员恢复和补水策略中的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Optimal-Hydration-post-exercise-Study-compares-sodium-and-carboHydrate-levels-in-sports-drinks-for- effective-reHydration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Optimal-Hydration-post-exercise-Study-compares-sodium-and-carboHydrate-levels-in-sports-drinks-for- effective-reHydration.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d3bedc3-95cc-46ae-9eb9-b4226769601b Mon, 13 Nov 2023 16:00:00 -0500 Optimal hydration post-exercise: Study compares sodium and carbohydrate levels in sports drinks for effective rehydration
主要试验发现阿哌沙班可降低设备检测到的心房颤动患者的中风风险一项全球研究发现，广泛使用的血液稀释剂阿哌沙班可显着减少患有房颤的高危患者中风的风险，这种房颤只能通过起搏器或其他植入的心脏电子设备检测到。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Major-trial-finds-apixaban-reduces-中风-风险-in-病人-with-device-Detected-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Major-trial-finds-apixaban-reduces-中风-风险-in-病人-with-device-Detected-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c164b432-9e8f-41d9-99f2-e04d5b845546 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 14:33:27 -0500 Major trial finds apixaban reduces stroke risk in patients with device-detected atrial fibrillation
